channel.title: Are the reserve coins (BAYR) timelocked for a month between each trade on an exchange? Or does does the timelock only occur when moving tokens on/off the exchange?
channel.description:
The reserve coins (BAYR) **are not timelocked between trades on centralized exchanges**. This is becuause the majority of centralized exchanges do not trade coins on the actual blockchain, as it slows things down. Instead, they use an in-house IOU accounting system.
Once the reserve coins are no longer frozen, they can be traded freely at any time.However once a user transfers possession 'on-chain' then the coins become timelocked again.
